newsArray.title: Lucas Beraldo (Brésil) : « Marquinhos est une source d'inspiration pour moi »
creator: Cédric Gerrier
newsArray.description: Sélectionné par Dorival pour participer à la Copa America avec le Brésil, Lucas Beraldo a l'impression de vivre un rêve en 2024. Le jeune défenseur de 20 ans s'est confié sur l'importance de son coéquipier au PSG et en sélection, Marquinhos, ces derniers mois.

newsArray.title: SON 재계약? 토트넘 레비는 관심 1도 없다! 토트넘 최대 관심사 "첼시 갤러거 확보"
newsArray.description: [스포츠조선 류동혁 기자] 손흥민(31·토트넘)의 푸대접이 계속되고 있다. 이런 상황에서 과연 토트넘 잔류의 의미에 의문점이 생길 만하다. 레전드에 대한 예우는 부족하다. 많이 부족하다. 올 시즌 손흥민은 부활했다. 에이스 리더로 맹활약했다. 토트넘의 심장이다. 그런데 돌아온 조건은 1년 계약 연장 옵션이다. 2025년 토트넘과 계약된 손흥민은 재계약 협상

newsArray.title: Saturday sport: Leinster face Ulster at Aviva, Dublin vs Kilkenny in Leinster hurling final
creator: Kildare Nationalist Reporter
newsArray.description: Athletics There’s plenty of Irish interest on day two of the European Athletics Championships in Rome. Oisin Lane goes in the men’s 20 kilometre race walk from 5pm Irish time. It’s women’s 100 metre hurdles day for Sarah Lavin – her semi-final is just after 9pm. Israel Olatunde will bid to make tonight’s 100 metre...Source

newsArray.title: George Kittle contract extension with 49ers is ‘not pressing need’
creator: Nick Kosko, 5 GOATs
newsArray.description: George Kittle could get a new contract with the San Francisco 49ers but it’s not pressing, according to ESPN’s Jeremy Fowler. The star tight end has two years left on his deal but the 49ers want to keep him in San Francisco for the foreseeable future while the team’s Super Bowl window is open.
